Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Great location for spending the evening, we loved the beer and bitterballens here. Attentive staff and quick service

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:
Amazing location with seats in the sun, attentive staff and quick service.

We bought 2 latte for about 5 euro's. The foam was thick and could carry a spoon ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Very rude staff! ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt have to be here!‚Äù The guy refused to serve us at the bar and as we were waiting for a car pickup, the waitress came to turn off the heating lamp outside (the terrace was empty) ha ha ha! Too bad it‚Äôs a beautiful place and I‚Äôve had many lovely moments there in the past.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:
The staff left us to stand in the doorway for ages while we waited to be QR scanned. The food is very limited (no fries ).. the burger bun was rock hard.
The waitress was wasn't friendly... serving us seemed a hassle for her.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Nice bar, finger food options was good. Portion size and taste of the burger was suprisingly large and tasty. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Each dish is like a art, colorful side dish or finger  food. The taste is awesome and nice ambience in Amsterdam!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Excellent table service- Parmezaaan ciabatta was really good!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Cool, relaxed setting positioned in front of a market place on a Saturday, good atmosphere. Then we eventually got served... 'Pint' was 3/4 full. Toastie (chorizo & cheese) took 45 minutes to come out, was bone dry and very average. Think I could've rustled one up better at home.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: A well-rounded joint in the centre of Amsterdam. Great service, food well above average, good beer. What else can one ask for. I was glad to leave a tip (although not required in these lands). I would certainly recommend it and come back.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Nice place to sit down with friends for some beers. I keep coming back for years. Even though it has a touristic location you will always find local at this place.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: One of the better bars in the very touristy area. They have good beers and it's indeed great people watching. Never eaten here, service can be a little slow but it's a really lovely old brown cafe

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Outdoor seats are great. In-house seats were basically empty when I visited. Food and drinks were okay. Nothing much too exciting though. Good place for a momentary stop and rest.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:
installed, order taken next to us and telling us then : we do not serve you saturated cuisine.
Avoid that place !

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Nice laid back place. Great for watching life go by. A smart selection of drinks and value for money food. My personal fav. If I had to choose would be eggs from the oven. Their nacho platter feeds a table. Highly recommended.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Delicious breakfast with toast, scrambled eggs, ham, cheese and jam. Fresh pressed orange juice and a coffee of choice for a moderate price. Waitress was very mindful and friendly. We can recommend this place for a breakfast.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Superb food and service! Nice start of the holiday ü§©üëèüëè

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: We come here since years - cool and relaxing location of Nieuw Markt, super friendly service, you really feel at home there ! And a pretty good kitchen as well, really good for a beer bar ! We love coming here ‚ù§üòçüëç the employees really ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Good old bar/cafe. Here you will find both locals and tourists. Nice staff. Good service. A very nice out door serving with infra heaters. From here you have a good view over Nye Markt and the Square. A good place to sit and relax in. Recommended.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: A very poor experience here, we sat down, the waitress took our order for drinks as we were looking at the menu for food, she delivered our drinks and went away. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Got handed the worst pint of my life in this bar....if you gave this to a person in ireland it would cause a riot. I poured it into the half pint glass beside it and it was actually less than half a pint

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Excellent waiters and great choices of beer. This place has local beers brewed in Netherlands, craft beers. It has also other options of bottle beers from outside, such as belgium, Germany and UK. If you are nearby, come here, it's pleasant to stay here.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: very family

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: A very nice bar just a cross the street of the metro station Nieuwmarkt . Drinks are fairly priced for the location, the staffs were all super friendly and nice. We spend the night drinking there, the interior on the inside seating is also looking really nice. What a great experience!!!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: The bar/ restaurant is definitely a must have for any young human who visits Amsterdam. The flair is pretty alternative, kindoff rocky and quaintly. My friends and me were searching for a not too expensive but not too classy place to eat, ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: I visited two countries while in Europe and this establishment was the only rude experience I had.  From the moment the waitress came out there was attitude from her.  I am a very friendly person and very respectful to others.  She was not ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:
Worst place I have ever visited.
As part of a group of 9, we walked in quietly and respectfully. 4 of our group stood at the bar to order pints while the rest of us seated ourselves at the back ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:
A fantastic recommendation from a local. It was very busy but worth the wait. I ordered for everyone, the chicken was so good we ordered more. The decor was relaxing and the staff were smart, polite and efficient.
Would definitely go back.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Popped in for a cheeky drink before dinner and was met with friendly service and a great selection of drinks. Will definitely be coming back for some afternoon beers when its a bit warmer. 4.8 stars rounded up to 5 cause they serve Weihenstephan.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: 't Loosje is situated on the Nieuwmarkt in an old building. The rustic interior is authentic and has not changed much over the years. Good beer and spirits selection. The simple dishes are the menu are OK nar food. One of the cosier places on the Nieuwmarkt with an extremely popular terrace when the weather permits it.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Delicious spot for Belgium beers!!!! Awesome staff. Great prices and the ambiance is just dope. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre passing thru or staying a while

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: The beauty of this bar is mostly that it hardly changed after the first time I visited 't Loosje, back in, well let's leave it at the end of last century. Fantastic beer choice with a lot from Amsterdam brewery het IJ, good food to go with ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Hereford Burger was good.  Good people watching in a good location.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Staff here was friendly and the service was propmt even during a busy lunch time. Food came out quickly and was very tasty. I would highly recommend this place for lunch if you're in the area.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: I hate to give one star as I feel it's rarely fair to owners. However, I faced real shady practices in this bar tonight: the owner refused to split our bill (50‚Ç¨+ bill) because "it's too busy tonight we can't split bills" then refused to produce an invoice for my company which I needed to reimburse this meal.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Really nice and cool place. Had a really yummy grilled chicken wrap. Staff was ok, however the guys who served us gave us some tourist tips what to see around the city...

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: The staff here were incredibly rude to me and my friends as soon as we entered and continued to harass us until we left, telling us to go and drink on the street where it's illegal to carry open containers of alcohol. We're a query bunch so very odd and still not sure what we did!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Great finger food and fine beers ! We often come here when we are in Amsterdam. Clean and polite, a good place for a quick lunch !

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Lovely outside seating area with heaters. Great selection of sandwiches and drinks. I recommend the Lumumba (hot chocolate with rum and whipped cream).

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Possible to enjoy typical Amsterdam pub outside at the New Markt because of the heating outside. Lovely people, lovely place. Of course a lot of tourists too.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Good place to meet up with some friends and try some different beers. Good location in the centre. Convenient next to the metro.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Nice wrap! And scones! Very cosy!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Awful waiters, really unpolite.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Old fashioned cafe bar in a great location.  Friendly staff and good choice of food.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: This is a great place to have a couple drinks outside, a nice snack, and watch the varied denizens of Amsterdam walk by. The staff here are super friendly too!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Proper bar with a local and oldskool feel and service to add to it, the waitress made us feel right at home, shoutout to her.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Definitely one of the good bars in the area. Super friendly staff, nice bits and bites to choose from, and prices are really good!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Great service. Nice place to grab a quick bite to eat and a couple of La Chouffes. Would go back again.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: nice caf√® in a very crowded part off the city.  the staff is very kind. there are sites outside for the nice weather...  warm atmosphere inside

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Great bar great food and friendly staff... became our local while in amsterdam

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Tasty beefburger and red Texels beer!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Been coming here on and off for year's. Top location on the Nieuwemarkt, exceedingly good service. Prices still in the realms of reality!

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Breakfast was very good, service quick and efficient, friendly staff, reasonable prices.  Will go again

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: Really nice little cafe. Got a brilliant sandwich and coffee. Great place to sit on the square.

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text:

Name: Lokaal Loosie
Review Text: It‚Äôs ok but no great experience. The food was just ok and the staff was friendly.
